name: Verify username

children.description:
Given the session is started with user and type of document
| cedula | type |
| 5729155 | CC |
crico@bancolombia.com.co opens the Bancolombia cobranza digital
When I enter the digital collection section
Then should see my name correctly on the screen 'RAUL'
